Hinge improves steps 2-4 with richer profiles (prompts), and through matching with a comment (higher % of matches that go to conversation).

It also converts to dates by reminding both users that they should go out after a long enough conversation.

1050383363717128192.text: Bumble tries to increase the 4th step, % of matches that go to conversation, by having women initiate conversations.

1050383139258986496.text:
Product thoughts on dating apps: It’s a funnel (top to bottom)

Number of people on the app
% of those I like
% of those who also like me
% of those that enter a conversation
% of those that end up going on a date

Have to improve each step.

1050382780218175489.text:
Tinder’s product team is one of best in the world. But of their 3 core product values, I’d say it’s:

Simple
Fun
Useful(getting less so)

Using the product does feel like work, and it’s not fun.
